page.title: 12SOUTH OTTERINGTON VILLAGE
page.content: South Otterington originally grew around the road from Northallerton to Ripon.It is called ribbon Development. A few years ago a modern estate was built to one side of the village. In the village is a garage that sells petrol,cars and does car maintenance. The manager is Mr. Raine,and the garage is always very busy.The most important car they have had in was a Bentley.The most expensive car was Â£14,000 and the fastest car went 145 miles to the hour.In one year the garage sold 75,000 gallons of petrol. There is one bus in the morning and bus at the end of the working day. There is no shop,no post_office but there is a public house and a rather beautiful old church.A few years ago there was a post_office and a house is still called after it.
